title: Channel Islands National Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar          The calendar below shows upcoming, scheduled events in the park. To ensure that all recurring events are shown, please be sure to click the box next to the text: "Show ALL instances of recurring events."          Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 5 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Channel Islands National Park Guided Hikes on the Islands      Location: Park Islands Fees: Free     Saturday, August 6, 2016 Everyday  from 04/10/2012 to 04/10/2020 On days that the concessionaire boats run to the islands, guided hikes may be offered by national park volunteers or concessionaire naturalists. If they are not available to lead hikes, self-guided interpretive trail booklets are available. View Details      Channel Islands National Park Channel Islands Live      Time: 11:30 AM to 12:00 PM,2:00 PM to 2:30 PM Location: On the web at link below or Anacapa Island or Visitor Center in Ventura Fees: Free     Wednesday, August 10, 2016 Every Wednesday Weekly  from 06/15/2016 to 08/10/2016 Take a virtual visit to the Channel Islands through live broadcasts from Anacapa Island that highlight the remarkable natural and cultural resources of the islands and their surrounding waters. View Details      Channel Islands National Park From Shore to Sea Centennial Lecture Series      Location: Robert J. Lagomarsino Channel Islands National Park Visitor Center  Fees: Free     Thursday, August 11, 2016 Join us at the Channel Islands National Park Robert J. Lagomarsino Visitor Center to learn more about recent research into the earliest human colonization of the Americas. View Details      Channel Islands National Park Channel Islands Live      Time: 1:00 PM to 1:30 PM Location: On the web at link below or Anacapa Island or Visitor Center in Ventura Fees: Free     Friday, August 19, 2016 Take a virtual visit to the Channel Islands through live broadcasts from Anacapa Island that highlight the remarkable natural and cultural resources of the islands and their surrounding waters. View Details      Channel Islands National Park Founders Day Outdoor Film      Location: Ventura Harbor Village Fees: Free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Outdoor screening of the documentary, West of the West: Tales from California’s Channel Islands, at the Ventura Harbor Village. This event will also include live music, yoga, and food trucks.  View Details
